task.title: Maintenance
task.shortdesc: How to clean Wall Mountable Bluetooth DVD Player

context.note: Please use cloth dipped in diluent detergent to clean device.

step.cmd: Set device in a place with enough air flow.

info.note: Avoid direct sunlight, extreme heat and moisture.

step.cmd: Use clean and soft cloth to central area to outside

info.note: No disk or sticker should be attached to device

step.cmd: Use camera lens brush to clean dust from laser lenses
Use clean cotton bud dipped with small omount of anhydrous alcohol to wipe laser lenses
Use plain clean cotton to wipe laser lenses
